Text: Is there an English version of this film,... ?
Is this about Maradona the footballing genuis? If so is it any good? Thanks

Uh, what does the soccer player Maradona have to do with the Sex Pistols?

I typed 'Sex Pistols' into the search engine and this comes up? I don't understand how this would be related in any way, unless maybe the Sex Pistols have a song in the video, or maybe they have a cameo or even mentioned by Maradona himself, but other than that, I find no reason this should be listed, at least in relation to the Sex Pistols.

I'm just saying...

Sex Pistols imply anarchy, on Kusturica's interpretation (quite accurate in fact), Maradona is the revolutionary, religious, against political factions, addicted, emotive, agressive football player, making him an anarchist by his perpetual discontentement . therefore Kusturica's association Sex Pistols / Maradona
